casebody.data:
SAGE REALTY LLC SERIES 2, a Domestic Limited Liability Company, Appellant,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York, AS TRUSTEE FOR the CERTIFICATEHOLDERS OF THE CWABS, INC., Asset Backed Certificates, Series 2005-17, Respondent. No. 73735 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 11, 2018
